description: Server-side entry point for handling HTTP requests in a Remix application, rendering React components to streams, and managing server responses with support for bot detection and CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, detects bots, and delegates to specific request handling functions.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from bots by rendering the React app to a stream and returning the response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers by rendering the React app to a stream and returning the response.
